 Andy Linden (actor)   
 From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia   
					Jump to:					 navigation , 					 search 
 Andy Linden 
 Born 
 England 
 Occupation 
 Actor 
 Years active 
 1988–present 
 Andy Linden  is an English actor. He is best known for his roles as  Mundungus Fletcher  in  Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows – Part 1  and John the Watch in  Count Arthur Strong . [1] [2]
